description: Detects suspicious interactive bash as a parent to rather uncommon child processes
false_positives: Legitimate software that uses these patterns
name: Interactive Bash Suspicious Children
query: (process.parent.command_line:"bash\ \-i" AND (process.command_line:(*\-c\ import\ * OR *base64* OR *pty.spawn*) OR process.executable:(*whoami OR *iptables OR *\/ncat OR *\/nc OR *\/netcat)))
author: Florian Roth
